actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide that interstate ambulance service, including rates charged for such ambulance service, shall be subject to regulation by the State in which such ambulance service originates.

summary.text: Authorizes each State in which interstate ambulance service originates to regulate such service.

titles.title: A bill to provide that interstate ambulance service, including rates charged for such ambulance service, shall be subject to regulation by the State in which such ambulance service originates.
